original_text: They will weep loudly because they are very upset about you. They will throw dirt on their heads. They will lie down in ashes. They will weep loudly because they are very upset about you. They will throw dirt on their heads. They will lie down in ashes. They will weep loudly because they are very upset about you.
korean_text: 너를 위하여 크게 소리 질러 통곡하고 티끌을 머리에 덮어쓰며 재 가운데에 뒹굴며

sentences.original_text: because they are very upset about you
They will throw dirt on their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 머리에 흙을 던질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will lie down in ashes
because they are very upset about you
They will throw dirt on their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 머리에 흙을 던질 것입니다
